title: Reorganize the README.md file
body:
### Issue Link :link: 
- [#2223](https://github.com/Alamofire/Alamofire/issues/2223)

### Goals :soccer:
- Reorganize the README.

### Implementation Details :construction:
- Separated Usage & Advanced Usage sections into individual markdown files.

title: Decodable response serialization and major refactor
body:
### Issue Link :link:
#2180

### Goals :soccer:
The primary goal of the PR is to add response serializers that use `JSONDecoder` and `PropertyListDecoder` to generically decode responses. However, that lead to a major refactor of the response serialization protocols and their implementations.

### Implementation Details :construction:
Functionally, the serializers are the same, they've just been encapsulated into classes, rather than being generated closures. This allows they to be more easily used, and the awkward extensions on `Request` that generated the closures have been removed. Also, the serializations protocols have had their requirements changed from a serialization closure to a function. This allows for far less awkward usage, as well as providing superior semantics with argument labels. 

### Testing Details :mag:
Tests have been added for the decodable serializers and response methods. Additionally, some of the tests have been refactored.
